messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com, "Nanci and Thomas Kuykendall"
<tn-k4of5@i...> wrote:
>
> I can't believe how this one little product has made me feel
better, look better, and has really changed my life.
> .......... just by sharing from our heart what Melaleuca means to
us.
>
> Okay...now I am intrigued. We have lots of allergies in this
house, and skin problems are not the least of them. I have been
hearing a lot about melaleuca and now I guess I had better give them
a try, considering we live in Idaho Falls, the home of melaleuca, and
I drive past the place all the time, and I know folks who work there.
>
> Nanci K.
>
> We've been using their stuff for a little over a year now and have
been very happy with. We especially like the laundry det. It keeps
going and going and going....
Amy

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom]Melaleuca Products
messages.msgSnippet: I can t believe how this one little product has made me feel better, look better, and has really changed my life. .......... just by sharing from our heart
messages.messageBody:
I can't believe how this one little product has made me feel better, look better, and has really changed my life.
.......... just by sharing from our heart what Melaleuca means to us.

Okay...now I am intrigued. We have lots of allergies in this house, and skin problems are not the least of them. I have been hearing a lot about melaleuca and now I guess I had better give them a try, considering we live in Idaho Falls, the home of melaleuca, and I drive past the place all the time, and I know folks who work there.

Nanci K.
